ack.p: We thank Patrice Coste, Aude de César, Cédric Johannel, Xavier Brusson, and Elodie Bailly for performing the bronchoalveolar lavages. We thank Hélène Bisceglia, Florine Guillaume, and Sandrine Montano for the cell processing and staining. We also thank Bachra Rokbi, Isabel Grégoire, and Anirban Sanyal (Sanofi) for critical review of the manuscript and for editorial assistance and manuscript coordination.
